channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- buildah
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- buildah

item.title: CVE-2020-10696|2024-08-04T11:06:11.148Z -- red%20hat -- buildah
item.description: A path traversal flaw was found in Buildah in versions before 1.14.5. This flaw allows an attacker to trick a user into building a malicious container image hosted on an HTTP(s) server and then write files to the user's system anywhere that the user has permissions.
